mapper.select: select a.shop_id shopId,b.member_code sellerCode from shop_info a inner join member_base_info b on a.seller_id = b.id

SELECT s.skuCode,s.goodsName,s.itemCode, s.salesAmount,s.salesGoodsCount,t.orderGoodsCount from (SELECT b.sku_code skuCode,b.goods_name goodsName,b.item_code itemCode, ifnull(sum(b.goods_amount),0) salesAmount, ifnull(sum(b.goods_count),0) salesGoodsCount, DATE_FORMAT(pay_order_time,'%Y-%m-%d') dealDate FROM trade_orders a,trade_order_items b WHERE a.order_no = b.order_no and a.order_status>=30 and a.seller_code = #{sellerCode} and a.is_cancel_order = '0' and DATE_FORMAT(a.pay_order_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{payOrderDate} group by b.sku_code) s LEFT JOIN (select ifnull(sum(b.goods_count),0) orderGoodsCount, DATE_FORMAT(pay_order_time,'%Y-%m-%d') dealDate from trade_orders a,trade_order_items b where a.order_no = b.order_no and a.seller_code = #{sellerCode} and DATE_FORMAT(a.create_order_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{payOrderDate} group by b.sku_code) t on t.dealDate = s.dealDate
mapper.insert: insert into SHOP_SALES_ANALYSIS_DAY_REPORT ( SHOP_ID, SALES_TIME, SKU_CODE, GOODS_NAME, ITEM_CODE, SALES_AMOUNT, SALES_GOODS_COUNT, ORDER_GOODS_COUNT, STATISTICS_TIME) values ( #{orderSkuAnalysisDMO.shopId}, #{orderSkuAnalysisDMO.salesTime}, #{orderSkuAnalysisDMO.skuCode}, #{orderSkuAnalysisDMO.goodsName}, #{orderSkuAnalysisDMO.itemCode}, #{orderSkuAnalysisDMO.salesAmount}, #{orderSkuAnalysisDMO.salesGoodsCount}, #{orderSkuAnalysisDMO.orderGoodsCount}, now() )
